tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Johnston is a very smart professor. He knows what he is talking about when he teaches. But oftentimes he skips the basic steps you need & will go straight into examples expecting you to pick up on the steps required. However, the examples he uses in class are very similar to his exam questions so it\'s important to take notes & attend lecture.

comments: Johnston\'s class was my hardest on my schedule but I had to take it and get through it. He is a great guy and funny, yet is very strange. You have to really pay attention and take notes the entire class. I studied a lot for each test.

stu_tags: INSPIRATIONAL  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: He is a formal teacher. He teaches material well, but isn\'t likely to help you with any submissions you\'ll be graded on. He is a stickler for proper mathematical notation, for good reason. He strikes a good balance between reviewing the textbook and explaining. (you will benefit a lot by reading before the lecture, but can survive without)

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  LECTURE HEAVY  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Took him for Calc2 and Natural Stats. He is a great lecturer, does not kill you with assignments, has reasonable tests. I never went to him for help, so I\'m not sure how helpful he is. You don\'t need to show up to Natural Stats, it\'s an easy A, but with Calc 2 you should of course show up and be ready to do some work.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I took Johnston for Calc I and Stats and he is a pretty good professor. He expects students in his class to pay attention and be respectful so make sure you don\'t goof around when you are in class. He is very helpful if you go to his office hours but his tests are tough. Make sure that you understand how he wants you do each problem.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: His lessons are very unclear and confusing. He can\'t articulate his thoughts well or in complete sentences at all. He\'s not very friendly and thinks he knows everything and makes you feel inferior and stupid. Worst teacher I\'ve ever had my entire life.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I got the 3rd highest grade in the class. When I asked about the low grades, he said I was doing fine and "the curve will handle it". 12 math/comp sci majors will have to repeat the course. For another class, he refused to hand back graded work. His examples did not follow book very well.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: If you can, do NOT take a class with Chris Johnston. Not only was it difficult to begin with, the way he teaches is very confusing. He makes you feel as if you should just drop out of college & work at a fast food restaurant. Do not ask questions in class. As boring as it may be, pay attention in the class and print out the notes.

comments: The class will be very difficult if you have not previously taken a Calculus 1 course. He does not explain concepts well but just does problems on the board and expects students to follow. He is also not very happy to answer the questions that are asked in class. If it helps he is really funny!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He is a great teacher as long as long as you are respectful and show that you are trying. He is available at any time to go over any questions that you have. All you have to do is show up to his office and he will help. Mr Feeny in present time, definitely.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Best professor I have ever had. Difficult, yes. Helpful, definitely. Will take any time out of his day to make you a better student and help you understand the material, but not just giving you the answers. For Boy Meets World fans, he is a modern day Mr. Feeny. Nobody has helped me like he has. Don\'t be so quick to judge him...
